pages.text: Until further notice, the BaerCraft quest book will no longer be worked on and most likely won't be until we update to 1.20+.$(br2)This has nothing to do with stages or advancements, only the book itself. That being said, I do plan on adding more advancements (some with rewards) and stages. So, I apologize for those who have been waiting on quests.
They're planned, but not for a while.
